description.narrative: This project will sell solar home systems ranging in size between 20; 50 and 100 watt systems that will power a variety of appliances including light bulbs; radios; mobile chargers and solar TVs. title.narrative: Green Scene Energy PLC Project

description.narrative: Sector: Solar, Summary: RK Renew Energy PLC is selling solar home systems using Pay-As-You-Go technology (through M-Birr) in the Oromia region of Ethiopia. The solar home systems will have three lights, and will be able to charge phones, radios, fans, televisions, and similar devices. RK Renew sees this as an opportunity to wean the population off of fossil fuels like kerosene.

title.narrative: YALI - Liche - New Preschool

description.narrative: Attitude and possibility starts young, but the school system in Ethiopia is designed for rote rather than creative learning. Mesay is setting up a Montessori-based primary school to address this lack, engaging both children and parents in the learning and development process. He plans to expand nationally, and set up schools that teach in the local language.

title.narrative: Young African Leaders Initiative (YALI) - SLM Teaching Aids

description.narrative: The teaching-aid materials we produce help to alleviate the shortage of teaching materials necessary to implement early childhood education successfully. Due to the increasing number of schools in Ethiopia, our company needs to increase production capacity. The proposed grant will enhance the companys production capacity, to meet the pressing demand for these materials. Our company has the vision to reach these products at the African continent level in its long-range plan.

title.narrative: Ethio Resource Group Wind Micro-grid Project

description.narrative: The project will be installing six 1-kilowatt wind turbine systems to power six micro-grids; which will be run and managed by EthioResource Group as a distributedenergy servicescompany. The installations will consist of six small wind electric generators and batteries for energy storage which will deliver power to 300 households; 20 enterprises and 1 health clinic.

title.narrative: YALI - Faye - Warka Payments

description.narrative: Ethiopia is the worlds fastest growing economy, but one of its biggest obstacles is the lack of information on business transactions. Minase has developed a cash register machine which he will distribute for free which can also be used as bank processing machines and mobile banking agents. This will simplify transaction follow up, process bankcards and mobile money, collect expenses online, declare and pay taxes online creating a more transparent and robust economy.

This grant will go towards purchase on cutting machine, chemicals, training , administrative and operation costs.
